'''''"Upstairs..."''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to attempt to walk in the room at the second floor of [[Uyuu Restaurant]] after listening to [[Kujou Sara]], [[Kuki Shinobu]] and Norika's conversation in ''[[Key Decision#Eavesdroppers|Eavesdroppers]]''.
